meanings.definition: A person's first or given name.
meanings.sent2: Please write your forename on the form.
meanings.sent3: The forename on my birth certificate is different from what my friends call me.
meanings.sent4: Her forename is like a beacon, guiding her through life.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked us to introduce ourselves with our forename.

meanings.definition: To name or mention a person's first name.
meanings.sent1: I always forename people when I meet them.
meanings.sent2: Remember to forename the guests when they arrive.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to forename the volunteer's chosen card before she even picked it.
meanings.sent4: She could forename every bird species in the forest by their calls.
meanings.sent5: The detective could forename the culprit just by looking at their handwriting.
